name: Apparition
description: In a hex you can see within range you create an image or sound that lasts for the duration of the spell. This apparition disappears if you cast this spell again, use your action to dismiss the spell or another creature uses their action to investigate it.

name: Decay
description: Target 1 hex that you see within range, all organic matter in that hex rots and decays.

name: Energy Bolt
description: Make a ranged spell attack at a creature you can see within range, on a hit the target suffers 1D8 force damage.

name: Fester
description: Make a ranged spell attack at a creature you can see within range, on a hit the target suffers 1D8 necrotic damage.

name: Flame Burst
description: Make a ranged spell attack at a creature you can see within range, on a hit the target suffers 1D8 fire damage.

name: Helping Hand
description: Target a hex that you can see within range, in that hex a floating spectral hand appears. For the duration of this spell you may use your action to control the hand. You can use the hand to manipulate objects, open doors, uncork potions and the like, though the hand can only carry up to 1Kg. If at any point, the hand goes more than 20 metres away from you or you cast this spell again the hand disappears.

name: Light
description: Target an item that you can see within range. For the duration of this spell the object emits a warm orange light, illuminating 30 metres around it.

name: Conjured Blade
description: Make a melee spell attack at a creature you can see within range, on a hit the target suffers 1D10 force damage.

name: Magic Trick
description: You invoke some kind of minor, harmless magical effect such as cleaning a plate, changing the colour of a flame or lighting a candle/torch.

name: Mend
description: This spell can repair any single break in an object within range such as torn cloth or a stick snapped in two. The break can be no bigger than 10cm in size and the item being repaired cannot be magical. The repaired item has no trace of having ever been broken.

name: Magic Arrow
description: Make a ranged spell attack at a creature you can see within range, on a hit the target suffers 1D8 poison damage.

name: Migraine
description: Make a ranged spell attack at a creature you can see within range, on a hit the target suffers 1D8 psychic damage.

name: Miasmic Missile
description: Make a ranged spell attack at a creature you can see within range, on a hit the target suffers 1D8 necrotic damage.

name: Transfer Thought
description: Target a creature that you can see within range and state a single sentence of 25 words or less. The target hears this message in their head, spoken in your voice.

name: Aid
description: Target a creature you can see within range and select an attribute or skill, the target’s dice in the selected attribute or skill is increased by 1 dice type for the duration of the spell. If the target has 1D12 in the chosen skill or attribute they will instead receive +1 rolls involving those dice.

name: Adaptation
description: Target a willing creature that you can see within range, for the duration of this spell the target gains a swim speed and climb speed equal to their movement speed and can breathe water and gases as if it were air.

name: Blur
description: Target a willing creature you can see within range, the target's Evasion is increased by 2. You may double the cost of this spell in order to target two willing creatures within range or triple it to target three.

name: Dark Vision
description: Target a creature you can see within range, the target gains a dark sight of 60 metres for the duration of this spell.

name: Elemental Aura
description: Choose one damage type of acid, cold, fire or lightning damage then target a willing creature you can see within range, the target becomes resistant to the damage type chosen for the duration of this spell. Additionally, allies of the target also become resistant to the chosen damage type while they are adjacent to the target during the duration of the spell.

name: Elemental Shield
description: Target a willing creature that you can see within range and choose one damage type of either acid, cold, fire or lightning. For the duration of this spell the target gains resistance to the chosen damage type. You may double the cost of this spell in order to target two willing creatures within range or triple it to target three.

name: Eye’s Behind
description: Target a willing creature you can see within range, all hexes adjacent to the target are considered to be their front hexes for the duration of this spell. You may double the cost of this spell in order to target two willing creatures within range or triple it to target three.

name: Far Vision
description: Target a creature you can see within range, the target gains the ability to see far beyond the limits of the human eye, they are able to clearly make out faces and other such detailed things from up to 1 kilometre away. Additionally, they may re-roll 1s and 2s on their Perception skill dice for the duration of this spell. You may double the cost of this spell in order to target two willing creatures within range or triple it to target three.

name: Featherfall
description: Target yourself and up to three other willing creatures that you can see within range. Any targets of this spell that are currently falling have their rate of descent reduced to 6 metres per turn for the duration of this spell. If any of these targets land before the spell ends they take no damage from the fall and land on their feet, ending the spell effect for that creature.

name: Flight
description: Target a willing creature you can see within range, the target gains a flight speed equal to their movement speed for the duration of this spell.

name: Growth Spurt
description: Target a willing creature or object that you can see within range, the target's size category increases by one, their strength and endurance increases by one attribute dice and they receive +1 damage to attacks made with melee weapons. If the target's strength or endurance is already D12 then the target receives +1 to any rolls made with these. These attribute increases do not directly increase the target's health however the target does gain +5 health, once the spell ends this health is removed whether it has been lost to damage or not meaning the ending of this spell will never kill a creature. Note that if there is not room to allow for the target to grow they will not and the spell will fail. Only solid immovable objects will stop it; however, any loose objects or creatures will instead be pushed directly back into the closest available hex.

name: Hammertouch
description: Target an item you can see within range, any damage rolls made with that item may receive +1D6 and deal force damage. A creature hit by the target weapon must succeed on a willpower strength save or be knocked prone. Additionally, the weapon deals double damage to inanimate objects.

name: Morph
description: Target a willing creature within range and alter their appearance. When you cast this spell you can choose to alter things about the target’s physical appearance such as their eyes, hair, skin, ears, nose, nails. Any alteration can only be minimal such as changing your skin colour, pointing your ears or shortening your nails. You cannot alter your height or weight to any substantial degree. Whatever addition or subtraction the spell creates is physical and becomes part of your body for the duration of the spell.

name: Repair
description: This spell can repair any break in an object within range such as a hole in a wall or shattered glass. The break can be no bigger than 1 hex in size and the target being repaired cannot be magical. The repaired item has no trace of having ever been broken and if you target a break larger than a hex in size then the portion of the break that is targeted will be repaired.

name: Rush
description: Target a willing creature you can see within range. The target creature's movement speed is doubled for the duration of this spell.

name: Shimmer Steel
description: Target an item you can see within range, any damage rolls made with that item may re-roll 1s and have +3. Additionally, the item now deals force damage.

name: Slippery Floor
description: Target an area with a diameter of 6 metres that you can see within range. Any creatures already in the affected area or that enters it must immediately make a Willpower Agility save. If you succeed this save then the affected creature is knocked prone.

name: Stitch Up
description: Target a willing creature that you can see within range, they restore 1D6 health if they are above half health, if the target is below half health then they restore 2D6 and if the target is on 5 health or less they restore 3D6. This spell can only be cast three times per day.

name: Stone Flesh
description: Target a willing creature you can see within range. The target’s defence is increased by 2, this additional defence is not considered when calculating hits to your armour’s durability.

name: Swift as Wind
description: Target a willing creature you can see within range. The target creature gains hover speed equal to their double movement speed and increases their evasion by 2.

name: Telekinesis
description: Target a willing creature you can see within range. The target of this spell gains the ability to move objects with their mind. As an action they may attempt to move any object of up to 500 kg weight, if the object isn't being worn or carried then it can immediately be moved 24 metres in any direction but no more than 30 metres away from the character moving it. You are able to manipulate objects with a certain amount of finesse, however doing things like pouring a beer or picking a pocket will require an Alteration skill check of some description. Once an object has been moved it will stay floating in position until the character who moved it’s next turn unless they choose to drop it at the end of their turn. Once their next turn comes around they may choose to continue moving the item or to drop it. If they do not use their next action to continue moving the object then it will fall.

name: Water Walk
description: Target a willing creature you can see within range. The target gains the ability to walk across the surface of liquids—such as water, acid, mud, snow, quicksand, or lava—as if it were solid ground (creatures crossing molten lava can still take damage from the heat however). If you target a creature submerged in a liquid, the spell carries the target to the surface of the liquid at a rate of 10 metres per turn.

name: Well of Hell
description: Target an area of water 10 metres in diameter, the target area of water turns to a pale green acid. Any creature that moves into this acid on their turn or starts their turn in it must succeed on a Willpower Endurance save or take 2D10 acid damage, taking half as much damage on a success.

name: Arcane Synergy
description: Target a summoned creature or your familiar that you can see within range. The target creature may immediately turn to face any direction and take an action.

name: Bind Familiar
description: Target a beast of a size category no larger than size category medium, that is considered an ally to you and sees you as a close companion. This could be a pet that you own, which is typically the easiest route as they will typically trust you off the bat, though you may attempt to tame more interesting beasts for a more challenging but more rewarding familiar. Over the course of the casting of this spell you bind yours and the creature's essence together, leaving both of you with matching magical scars, tattoos or blemishes. The creature is now your familiar, its Mind attribute dice is immediately raised to 1D6 if it was not already and it can understand all languages you do, you can use your action to see through its eyes and you can communicate with it telepathically. Additionally, when you cast a spell with a range of touch, you may choose to cast them through your familiar meaning you may select targets as if you were standing where your familiar is standing - when you do this, both yours and your familiars marking flare up with burning colourful light. If your familiar is killed you may resurrect it over the course of 1 hour in one of your front hexes at the cost of 5 Exertion.

name: Binding Chains
description: Target a creature that you can see within range, the target must succeed on a Willpower, Strength save or be constrained for the duration of this spell. The target may repeat this save at the end of their subsequent turns in an attempt to end the spell early.

name: Create & Destroy Water
description: Target a hex that you can see within range, you may either fill the target hex with water or destroy all water in that hex.

name: Create Wall
description: Target up to 7 connected unoccupied hexes you can see within range. On a success, the target hexes are filled with 2 metre tall pillars forming a wall for the duration of this spell. These pillars have 4 defence and 20 health, if one is destroyed that hex of the wall disappears.

name: Darkness
description: Target an area you can see with a diameter of 10 metres you can see within range. The targeted hexes are filled with magical darkness, meaning these hexes now block your eyeline. Any creatures within this darkness are considered to be blind and attack rolls made against them are made at -4.

name: Flubber
description: Target an unoccupied hex that you can see within range, a bouncy block of green gelatin appears in the target hex. Any projectiles that hit this gelatin are bounced back at their source and any creatures that fall onto it take no fall damage and are knocked prone in an adjacent hex of their choice. The gelatin block does not have any health but will melt away after the spell's duration or if it takes any acid damage.

name: Fortify Summon
description: Target a creature you have summoned or your familiar. The target creature heals 3D4+2 health.

name: Helpful Hut
description: You summon a single roomed sturdy earthen hut for the duration of this spell. The room inside has a 6 metre Diameter and includes 1 entrance and no windows. The hut includes a fireplace complete with basic chimney and rudimentary insulation.

name: Pian-Ouch
description: Target a creature that you can see within range. You summon a large oak wood piano above their head which falls upon them. The target must succeed on a Willpower Agility save or take 2D8 bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone & pinned under the piano until the end of their next turn. On a successful save the target takes half damage and is not pinned.

name: Spectral Slap
description: Target an area with a diameter of 6 metres that you can see within range, all creatures within the target area must succeed on a Willpower agility save or be knocked prone and take 2D6 force damage and be knocked prone. On a successful save the target takes half damage and is not knocked prone.

name: Summon Wolves
description: Target two hexes that you can see within range, in each target hex you summon a common wolf. These wolves roll their own initiative and will follow the commands of the caster. The caster of this spell can give an order telepathically with no action required, However they can never give more than one order in a round of combat. If the caster breaks concentration or the wolf is killed it vanishes.

name: Summon Bear
description: Target a hex that you can see within range, in the target hex you summon a brown bear. This bear rolls their own initiative and will follow the commands of the caster. The caster of this spell can give an order telepathically with no action required, However they can never give more than one order in a round of combat. If the caster breaks concentration or the bear is killed it vanishes.

name: Summon Gargoyle
description: Target a hex that you can see within range, in the target hex you summon a gargoyle. This gargoyle rolls their own initiative and will follow the commands of the caster. The caster of this spell can give an order telepathically with no action required, However they can never give more than one order in a round of combat. If the caster breaks concentration or the gargoyle is killed it vanishes.

name: Summon Wyvern
description: Target a hex that you can see within range, in the target hex you summon a wyvern. This wyvern rolls their own initiative and will follow the commands of the caster. The caster of this spell can give an order telepathically with no action required, However they can never give more than one order in a round of combat. If the caster breaks concentration or the wyvern is killed it vanishes.

name: Summon Elemental
description: Target a hex that you can see within range, in the target hex you summon either an Earth, Water, Fire or Air Elemental. This Elemental rolls their own initiative and will follow the commands of the caster. All commands must be given verbally with no action required, However they can never give more than one order in a round of combat. If the caster breaks concentration or the Elemental is killed it is banished back to its home.

name: Summon Gorgon
description: Target a hex that you can see within range, in the target hex you summon a Gorgon. This Gorgon rolls their own initiative and will follow the commands of the caster. The caster of this spell can give an order telepathically with no action required, However they can never give more than one order in a round of combat. If the caster breaks concentration or the Gorgon is killed it vanishes.

name: Summon Magnificent Mount
description: You summon a large ethereal Gryphon, Pegasus or some other horse sized mount in an area you can see within range. This creature has 1D6 in all attributes, 7 Evasion, 12 health, 16 metre movement speed and a flight speed of 24 metres. It is strong enough to carry two adult humans. This summoned creature rolls its own initiative and has a telepathic connection with you, following your commands to the best of its abilities. When this spell ends or the mount is reduced to 0 health it disappears and drops all items it may have been carrying. You may only have one Magnificent Mount summoned at any given time.

name: Torrent of Spikes
description: You create a spray with a width of 6 metres and a length of 10 metres. Any creatures hit by the spray must succeed on an Willpower Agility save or take 2D8+2 piercing damage.

name: Acid Lance
description: You create spray with a width of 2 metres and a length of 12 metres. Any creatures hit by the spray must succeed on an Willpower Agility save or take 2D8 acid damage. You may double the cost of this spell to deal 2D8+2 acid damage or triple it to deal 2D8+4 acid damage.

name: Blast
description: Make a spell attack at a creature you can see within range, on a hit the target suffers 2D6 force damage. You may double the cost of this spell to deal 2D6+2 force damage or triple it to deal 2D6+4 force damage.

name: Chain Lightning
description: Target a creature you can see within range that creature must make a Willpower Agility save or take 3D10 lightning damage taking half as much on a successful save. After this damage is resolved, reduce the damage of this spell by 1D10 and select another creature that you can see within 10 metres of your target to be your next target. The new target must make a Willpower Agility save dealing the new damage on a hit on a fail and half as much on a success. Repeat this process one more time dealing 1D10 lightning damage. Note that any given creature can only be targeted once by any given cast of this spell.

name: Dazzle
description: All enemies within range that are not behind solid cover must make a Willpower Endurance save or be blinded until the end of your next turn. Additionally, any magical darkness in range of this spell is immediately dispelled.

name: Elemental Weapon
description: Target a weapon that you can see within range. You may change that weapon's damage type to either acid, cold, fire or lightning and increase its damage by 1D4 for the duration of this spell.

name: Everflame
description: Target a point on an object that you can see within range. From that point a flame appears in a colour of your choosing, illuminating 30 metres around it. This light cannot be put out by any non-magical means but can be willed on and off by the caster as a minor action. The caster may have as many of these lights as they like at any given time and can will as many of them on or off as they like as a minor action.

name: Fire
description: Target 7 connected hexes that you can see within range. The target hexes are engulfed in flames from the duration of this spell. If a creature enters the affected hex or ends their turn in it they must succeed a Willpower Agility save or immediately take 2D4 fire damage.

name: Fireball
description: Target an area with a 10m diameter that you can see within range. All creatures in the target area must succeed on a Willpower Agility save or take 2D8 fire damage, taking half damage on a successful save.

name: Firebolt
description: Make a spell attack at a creature you can see within range, on a hit the target suffers 2D8 fire damage. You may double the cost of this spell to deal 2D8+2 fire damage or triple it to deal 2D8+4 fire damage.

name: Flaming Falchion
description: For the duration of this spell, on your turn as an action you may make a melee spell attack dealing 2D6 fire damage on a hit as long as you have at least one hand free.

name: Freeze
description: Target a creature that you can see within range, they must succeed on a Willpower Endurance save or be constrained for the duration of this spell. The target may repeat this save at the end of each of their turns in an attempt to end the spell.

name: Frostblast
description: You create spray with a width of 6 metres and a length of 8 metres. Any creatures hit by the spray must succeed on an Willpower Agility save or take 2D8 Cold Damage, taking half on a success.

name: Ice Zone
description: Target an area with a diameter of 10 metres that you can see within range. For the duration of this spell any liquids in this area freeze solid, rendering potions useless. If it is raining, all rain that passes through the area is also frozen creating a torrent of hail, any creature that moves into this area on their turn or starts their turn in it while it is hailing must succeed on a Willpower Agility save or take 2D8 cold damage.

name: Lightning
description: Make a spell attack at a creature you can see within range, on a hit the target suffers 2D10 lightning damage. You may double the cost of this spell to deal 2D10+2 lightning damage or triple it to deal 2D10+4 lightning damage.

name: Immolate
description: Target an area with a 10m diameter that you can see within range. All creatures in the target area must succeed on a Willpower Agility save or take 6D6 fire damage, taking half damage on a successful save. Additionally, all hexes in the target area burst into flame for 1 minute. If a creature enters an affected hex or ends their turn in it they must succeed a Willpower Agility save or immediately take 2D4 fire damage.

name: Magic Rainstorm
description: Target an area with a diameter of 10 metres you can see within range, a raining and crackling thunder cloud appears above the target area for the duration of this spell. If an enemy creature enters an affected hex or starts their turn in it they must succeed a Willpower Agility save or immediately take 2D8 lightning damage. Additionally, no fire, magical or otherwise, can be created in or pass through the affected area for the duration of this spell.

name: Shock Shield
description: Target a willing creature you can see within range. The target is adorned with a crackling cloak of lightning. For the duration of this spell, any creatures of the casters choosing that enters or starts their turn in a hex adjacent to the target must succeed on an Endurance Willpower save or take 2D6 lightning damage, taking half damage on a successful save.

name: Shockwave
description: All creatures adjacent to you must succeed on a Willpower Agility save or take 2D6 force damage and be knocked prone, taking half damage on a successful save.

name: Wildfire
description: Target a creature that you can see within range, the target must succeed on a Willpower Agility save taking 2D6 fire damage on a fail and half as much on a success. On subsequent turns you can use your action to either cause the target to make another save or you can move the Wildfire to another creature within 10 metres of the current target forcing them to succeed on a Willpower Agility save or take 2D6 fire damage on a fail and half on a success. You can repeat this process as long as you are concentrating on this spell.

name: Wizard’s Wrath
description: Make a spell attack at a creature you can see within range, on a hit the target suffers 2D12 force damage. You may double the cost of this spell to deal 2D12+2 force damage or triple it to deal 2D12+4 force damage.

name: Anxious Malediction
description: Target a creature that you can see within range, they become overcome with nerves and begin sweating, stuttering and stumbling over their words. They have -4 to all Deception, Insight, Performance and Persuasion skill checks for the duration of this spell and people will generally receive them as a stammering fool unless they know the target well.

name: Cerebral Phantom
description: Target a creature that you can see within range, they must succeed on a Willpower save or be subject to a cerebral phantom for the duration of this spell. You craft an illusion that takes root in the mind of the target. They are affected by an illusory object, creature, or other visible phenomenon of your choice that is no larger than a 1 hex in size and that is perceivable only to the target for the duration. The illusion includes sound, temperature, and other stimuli, also evident only to the creature. While a target is affected by the spell, the target treats the illusion as if it were real. The target rationalises any illogical outcomes from interacting with the illusion. Each round on your turn, the illusion can deal 1D6 psychic damage to the target if it is in the illusion’s area or within 5 feet of the illusion, provided that the illusion is of a creature or hazard that could logically deal damage, such as by attacking. The target perceives the damage as a type appropriate to the illusion. During the duration of this spell the target may use their action to repeat the save in an attempt to end the spell.

name: Charm
description: Target a creature that you can see within range, the target must succeed on a Willpower save or be charmed by you for the duration of this spell.

name: Control Animal
description: Target a beast you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Willpower save or be charmed by you for the duration of this spell. If you or any creatures that are obviously your allies are fighting the target then they have a +2 to the Save. While the target is charmed by you via this spell you have a telepathic link with it that can be used to issue commands to it with no action required, the target will follow these commands to the best of their ability.

name: Control Creature
description: Target any creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Willpower save or be charmed by you for the duration of this spell. While the target is charmed by you via this spell you have a telepathic link with it that can be used to issue commands to it with no action required, the target will follow these commands to the best of their ability.

name: Doppelgangers
description: When you cast this spell you create 3 doppelgangers, these are magical images of yourself that exist on your hex and act as magical distractions to any assailants. Whenever you are the target of an attack, roll randomly to see if the attack hits you or one of your doppelgangers. If it hits a doppelganger then it is immediately destroyed.

name: Drop Weapon
description: Target a creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Willpower save or drop any one item they are holding in their hand in an adjacent hex of your choice.

name: Fearful Visions
description: Target a creature that you can see within range, the target must succeed on a Willpower Save or become frightened of you for the duration of this spell. The target may repeat the save at the end of each of their subsequent turns in an attempt to end the spell early.

name: Flee
description: Target an area with a diameter of 10 metre that you can see within range, the target must succeed on a Willpower Save or become frightened of you for the duration of this spell and must use their move to get as far away from you as they can without directly harming themselves.

name: Glamour
description: Target a willing creature within range. You vail them in an illusion, changing their appearance to look like whatever you want with the following restrictions: You cannot increase or decrease their size category, leave or create anything physical, or make them invisible or camouflaged.

name: Hinder
description: Target a creature that you can see within range, they must succeed on a Willpower Endurance save or have one of their attributes of your choice reduced by 1 dice type for the duration of this spell.

name: Illusory Script
description: You write on parchment, paper, or some other suitable writing material and imbue it with a potent illusion that lasts for the duration of this spell. To you and any creatures you designate, the writing appears normal and conveys whatever meaning you intended.

name: Invisibility
description: Target a willing creature you can see within range, the target becomes invisible for the duration of this spell, though if the target attacks or casts a spell while invisible, the spell ends early.

name: Illusion
description: Target up to 7 connected hexes that you can see within range. The illusion can be of anything the caster wishes and will appear to be completely real. For the illusion to move or change the sounds that it makes requires the active attention of the caster.

name: Minor Illusion
description: Target a hex that you can see within range. In this hex you create an illusion no larger than 2 metres in any dimension. The illusion can be of anything the caster wishes and will appear to be completely real.

name: Impair Senses
description: Target a creature you can see within range and choose to Blind, Deafen or remove the ability to smell from this target. The target of this spell must succeed on a Willpower Endurance save or have the chosen effect imposed upon them for the duration of the spell.

name: Shadows of Your Past
description: Target a creature you can see within range, they are forced to relive the darkest moments of their past. The target must succeed on a Willpower save or become incapacitated for 1 minute and take 2D6 psychic damage at the start of each of their turns.

name: Sluggishness
description: Target a creature you can see within range, the target must succeed on a Willpower Endurance save or have their movement speed halved for this spell's duration.

name: Superior Invisibility
description: Target a willing creature you can see within range, the target becomes invisible for the duration of this spell.

name: Telepathy
description: Target a willing creature you can see within range. The target enters into a telepathic bond with you, you and them are now able to telepathically communicate while you are within 100 metres of each other.

name: Animate
description:
Target a size category medium or smaller sized object you can see within range that is not being worn or carried. The target object becomes magically animated and can be commanded by you mentally for the duration of the spell or until they are killed. As a minor action you may issue your animated object a command if they are within 100 metres of you, this command dictates what action it will take and where it will move on its next turn. If you issue a general command, such as "guard this door" or "run in circles" then your animated object will follow this command until it is told otherwise. If your animated object is given no commands then it will simply defend itself to the best of its ability.

Animated Object Statistics:
Tiny: 6 Health, 8 Evasion, 1D4 Strength, 1D8 Agility, 1D6 Endurance, 1D4 Mind, 1D4 Willpower, Melee Attack 2D6 to hit 2D4 bludgeoning damage.
Small: 14 Health, 7 Evasion, 1D6 Strength, 1D6 Agility, 1D6 Endurance, 1D4 Mind, 1D4 Willpower, Melee Attack 2D6 to hit 1D6+1D4 bludgeoning damage.
Medium: 20 Health, 6 Evasion, 1D8 Strength, 1D4 Agility, 1D6 Endurance, 1D4 Mind, 1D4 Willpower, Melee Attack 2D6 to hit 2D6 bludgeoning damage.

All animated objects are considered to be Constructs with attributes and actions as shown above. Their movement speed is 12 metres, if an animated object has reasonably sized legs (such as a table or chair's legs) then they will use these to walk, otherwise they will have a flight speed of 12 metres. If the animated object is securely attached to a surface then its Movement Speed is 0m. Animated objects have a blind sight of 12 metres. Some objects' damage type may change depending on what they are, an animated nail for example may do piercing damage rather than bludgeoning damage.

name: Comprehend Languages
description: Target a willing creature you can see within range. On a success, the target understands the literal meaning of any spoken language that they hear spoken by humanoids for the duration of this spell. The target also understands any written language that you see that is still spoken commonly but you must be touching the surface on which the words are written.

name: Conceal
description: Target an object or willing creature that you can see within range that is under the influence of a magical effect. The target is hidden from all magical detection spells for the duration of this spell, instead appearing simply as a mundane object or creature.

name: Cover Trail
description: Target up to 6 creatures within range, these targets do not leave any footprints or other signs of their traversal for the duration of this spell.

name: Detect Magic
description: If an item within range is magical in any way you will be aware of it and it will glow a faint blue.

name: Disrupting Beams
description: Make a spell attack against up to three creatures you can see within range, on a hit the targets suffer 2D8 force damage. If the target is a summoned creature, a familiar, a celestial or a demon then deal +1D8 damage.

name: Distorting Blast
description: Make a spell attack at a creature you can see within range, on a hit the target suffers 2D6 force damage. If the target is a summoned creature, a familiar, a celestial or a demon then deal +1D6 damage.

name: Expunge
description: Target a creature or object within range. The target object or creature has all active spell effects cast on them removed. Note that this spell has no effects on magical items.

name: Legend-Lore
description:
Name or describe a person, place, or object. The spell brings to your mind a brief summary of the significant lore about the thing you named. The lore might consist of current tales, forgotten stories, or even secret lore that has never been widely known. If the thing you named isn’t of legendary importance, you gain no information. The more information you already have about the thing, the more precise and detailed the information you receive is.

The information you learn is accurate but might be couched in figurative language. For example, if you have a mysterious magic axe on hand, the spell might yield this information: "Woe to the evildoer whose hand touches the axe, for even the haft slices the hand of the evil ones. Only a true Child of Stone, lover and beloved of Moradin, may awaken the true powers of the axe, and only with the sacred word Rudnogg on the lips".

name: Locate Object
description:
Describe or name an object that is familiar to you. You sense the direction to the object’s location, as long as that object is within 1 kilometre of you. If the object is in motion, you know the direction of its movement.

The spell can locate a specific object known to you, as long as you have seen it up close at least once. Alternatively, the spell can locate the nearest object of a particular kind, such as a certain kind of apparel, jewellery, furniture, tool, or weapon.

This spell cannot locate an object if any thickness of lead, even a thin sheet, blocks a direct path between you and the object and it cannot locate magical items.

name: Lock & Knock
description:
This is two spells in one. The first is Lock, you touch a closed door, window, gate, chest, lockbox or other similar entrance way, it becomes magically locked. You and any characters you designate are still able to open the target. You may also opt to use a password to the lock or some kind of action (such as a little dance) that must be performed within 2 metres of the object in order to open it.

The second spell is Knock. You touch a door, window, gate, chest, lockbox or other similar entrance way or container that is locked with either a conventional lock or a Lock spell. It springs open. If the target was locked with a Lock spell, the spell is suppressed for the duration of the spell.

name: Mage’s Sight
description: Target a willing creature you can see within range. The target of the spell can see through darkness, invisibility, smog/mist, and illusions for the duration of the spell. Additionally, any magical items or creatures/items with a spell active on them will appear to glow a faint blue when within 10 metres of the target.

name: Pardis
description:
Target any container less than one hex in size. The inside of the container grows enormously in size allowing for any items to magically fit inside it. This doesn't change the external size or the weight of the target, no matter how much is placed inside the container over the course of this spell it will remain its original weight. Objects that otherwise would not fit through the opening of the container will magically slip inside to allow for easy transportation. The container is able to carry up to 10,000Kg of items before it is full.

Once this spell ends, items in the container spew forth onto the ground in front of the container.

No item with this spell cast upon it can be placed inside another.

name: Scent
description: Target an object within range. You gather a scent off of the object from someone of your choice who has handled it in the past week, you are able to innately attribute each scent to its owner if you know anything of them at all. For the duration of the spell you are able to track them flawlessly unless impeded by magic.

name: Silence
description: Target an area with a diameter of 10 metres that you can see within range. On a success, no noise can be made within that area. Meaning wizards cannot cast within it as they cannot speak, explosions are silent and no one can hear footsteps from within.

name: Soul Sight
description: For the duration of this spell you know how many creatures there are within 30 metres of you, where exactly they are and their creature type.

name: Teleport
description: Target a hex within range that you can see. You are immediately moved to that hex facing in any direction you wish. This does not incur attacks of opportunity.

name: Trip
description: Target a creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Willpower Strength save or be knocked prone. Additionally, when you cast this spell you may increase its cost by 1 in order to move the target up to 6 metres horizontally. When the target of this spell is moved they can clear obstacles of up to 2 metres in height. This spell may be cast on objects no larger than medium and will automatically be successful.

name: Unravel Magic
description: Target a creature or object you can see within range. The target object or creature has a single active spell effect cast on them removed. Note that this spell has no effects on magical items.

name: Ward
description: Target a hex that you can see within range. For the duration of this spell, any creature that comes through that hex will trigger the ward, this alerts the caster that their ward has been entered. The ward does not need to have any visual or audio tells that it has been triggered but the caster may add all the menial bells and whistles they would like, such as the hex flashing red and maybe a siren sounding.

name: Armour of the Grave
description: Target both a corpse and an undead that you can see within range. The corpse is consumed to form a layer of armour from its skin, flesh and bones around the undead. This armour is permanent and is equivalent to studded leather, meaning it has a defence of 6 and a durability 20. The armour created using this spell can be repaired as normal but is fused to the target undead and as such cannot be taken from them.

name: Black Barrier
description: Target up to 10 adjacent hexes that you can see within range, each of these hexes is filled with a necrotic black smoke that stretches 5 metres into the air from the ground up. Any creature within these hexes is considered blinded until they leave and the smoke blocks eyeline. If any creature starts their turn or moves into the black smoke, they must make a Willpower Endurance save or take 2D6 necrotic damage, taking half damage on a successful save.

name: Black Dart
description: Target a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Willpower Endurance save or take 2D6 poison damage and be poisoned(1) until the end of their next turn. Taking half damage and not becoming poisoned on a successful save.

name: Carrion Wight
description: Target a corpse of a carrion eater of a size category no larger than size category medium and infuse it with your life and will, causing it to rise as a Carrion Wight. These creatures resemble their living counterparts except their bodily features such as fur, feathers and eye colour become sickly pale. The Carrion Wight can understand all languages you do and you can use your action to see through its eyes and you can communicate with it telepathically, you can speak through its mouth and extend your will through it to command the undead. Additionally, when you cast a spell with a range of touch, you may choose to cast them through your Carrion Wight meaning you may select targets as if you were standing where your familiar is standing. You can also draw line of sight from the Carrion Wight when casting necromancy spells however your body still has to be in range of the target and any projectiles are still blocked by terrain. You may only have 1 Carrion Wight under your command at a time.

name: Circle of the Damned
description: Target a 6 metre diameter area that you can see within range, a fell circle appears for the duration of this spell, within which small animals, insects and plants wither and die. Any undead raised within this circle have an additional 4 health and deal an extra 1D4 necrotic damage with their attacks.

name: Enthrall
description: Target a creature that you can see within range. If the creature has Marked for Death the range of this spell is increased to 40 metres and you do not require sight to target them. Make a spell attack on the target, on a hit you deal 2D8 necrotic damage to the target. Additionally, should you kill the target, they become an undead minion that you may control temporarily for 12 turns, after which they return to their normal dead state, the minion has 1D6 in all statistics and skills, has 10 health if standard humanoid size, and will have no penalty to wield the weapon and armour they use. You may upcast this spell to target up to 2 additional creatures for 2 Exertion per additional target.

name: Excorpus
description: Target a corpse or any friendly undead that you can see within range. The target explodes and is destroyed, everything within 6 metres must make a Willpower Strength save or take 2D6 fire and 2D6 Bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. Taking half damage on a successful save and not being knocked prone.

name: Foul Mimicry
description: Touch a corpse or pile of bones of a natural creature of size category medium, you imbue the target with a portion of your own life force, raising it as an undead monstrosity, a foul mimicry. Once you have raised the creature your health is reduced by 2 until the foul mimicry is destroyed. If the target was a mostly put together corpse they are raised as zombies and if the target was a pile of bones they are raised as a skeleton (A full skeleton is not needed for this purpose as amalgams of bones can also be animated), the stats for which are provided in the bestiary. The raised creature rolls their own initiative and will follow the commands of the caster. The caster of this spell can give an order telepathically with no action required. If the caster of this spell dies before their creation then the foul mimicry becomes feral and will act as the GM sees fit.

name: Life Leech
description: Make a spell attack at a creature you can see within range, on a hit the target suffers 2D6 necrotic damage. You may double the cost to cast this spell to deal 2D6+2 necrotic damage or triple it to deal 2D6+4 necrotic damage. Additionally, for every 5 points of damage this spell deals to a conventionally living target’s health you are healed by 1 health.

name: Marked For Death
description: Target a creature that you can see within range. Until the spell ends the target is marked for death, A target that is marked for death will suffer an additional 2D8 necrotic damage from the caster’s next hit or the next hit of an undead under the caster’s control. The mark then fades and the spell ends. You may double the cost of this spell to deal 2D8+2 necrotic damage or triple it to deal 2D8+4 necrotic damage.

name: Mortal Coil
description: Target a creature that you can see within range, the target must succeed on a Willpower Mind save or become vulnerable to all damage types. If the creature is already resistant to a damage type then they lose their resistance but do not become vulnerable and if they are immune to a damage type they remain immune. The target may repeat their save at the end of each of their turns in an attempt to end the spell.

name: Mortuary Reinforcement
description: Targets a corpse that has died within 24 hours. The flesh and bone of the corpse is stripped away and used to repair the bodies of the undead. You may heal as many undead as you choose within 10m for a combined total of the max health that the target corpse had in life. You may cast the spell for a cost of 5 on the body of a creature that has died within 24 hours to extract the remnant of life from the corpse to reinforce the binding of an undead within 10m. The undead’s max health is increased by 4 to a max of the creature’s max health in life.

name: Pimpling
description: Target a creature that you can see within range, the target must succeed on a Willpower Endurance save or have their face covered in large white pus-filled pimples for the duration of this spell. Due to these pimples the target suffers -2 to all Performance and Persuasion skill checks. Additionally, if another creature comes into contact with the pus from these pimples they must immediately make a Willpower Endurance save or be afflicted with this same spell also in addition to any other diseases that that person was carrying. The afflicted creature may repeat their save every 3 days, becoming cured on a success.

name: Preserve
description: Target a corpse within range, for the duration of the spell the target is protected from all natural decay and cannot be raised as an undead in any way. The time a corpse spends in this state does not count towards the age of the corpse for the purposes of determining whether or not it can be raised as an undead or revived.

name: Raise Wight
description: Target the corpse of a humanoid creature no larger than size category medium that died no more than 1 year ago. You awaken the target from their deathly slumber to work by your side as an echo of their former self… a Wight. The creature raised by this spell has the same Attributes, traits, and spells as they did in life. Although any extraordinary abilities such as vampirism or lycanthropy died with them. Physically the Wight appears as they did in life though they are now deathly pale, and their irises are pure white. Most shockingly of all, Wights have an unnatural necrotic aura that kills all plants and small living creatures within a megahex of them. Wights maintain the majority of their personality from their life over to undeath although they will not ever work intentionally against their master regardless of how good they were in life and they are fully aware of the fact that they have died in the past and because of this they will not usually be the most positive of creatures regardless of their personality in life. Once you have raised the Wight your health is reduced by 4 until the Wight is destroyed.

name: Reaper’s Arms
description: Target an undead that you can see within range and imbue their attacks with rot and decay. The target's attacks do an additional 1D4 damage and deal necrotic damage. You may double the cost of this spell to target 2 undead or triple it to target 3.

name: Revenant’s Remembrance
description: You touch a piece of a creatures corpse that has died within 24 hours and extract a fragment of their memory. You can infuse an undead within 10m of the caster with the memory increasing one of their skill dice to what the corpse's skill dice was in life for that skill. When casting the spell the caster can instead cast with a cost of 8 and instead infuse the undead with a fragment of a humanoid corpse’s power. You increase one of the undead’s attribute dice to what the corpse's attribute dice was in life for that attribute.

name: Soul Tear
description: Target a creature that you can see within range, the target creature must succeed on a Willpower Mind save or take 2D8 necrotic damage ignoring all armour or natural defence. You may increase the cost of this spell by 1 to deal 2D8+2 necrotic damage or by 2 to deal 2D8+4 necrotic damage.

name: Speak with Dead
description: Target the corpse of an intelligent creature that died no longer than 1 year ago. A harmless ghostly visage of the target appears above the corpse for the duration of this spell, this visage has all of the memories and knowledge that the target had in life including the languages it knew and no more. This visage may speak to those around it if it wishes though it may choose not too if it sees fit.

name: Stolen Vigour
description: Target a creature within reach that is conventionally living. Make a melee spell attack against the target. On a hit the target suffers 2D8 necrotic damage. The damage done to the target's health from this attack can then be used to heal undead within 10m of the caster, split as the caster sees fit. You may increase the cost of the spell by 1 to deal 2D8+2 necrotic damage or increase the cost by 2 to deal 2D8+4 necrotic damage.

name: Vile Celerity
description: Target any number of undead under your control that you can see within range. The target undead may immediately turn to face any direction and take an action. For each undead targeted with this spell, the caster takes 1 point of unavoidable damage.

name: Bane of Living
description: Target a creature within range, the target must make a Willpower Endurance save or be rendered unable to heal from any sources for the duration of this spell. This spell may be upcast to affect additional creatures within range, costing an additional 2 exertion per extra creature.

name: Blood Corruption
description: Target a creature that you can see within range, they must succeed on a Willpower Endurance save or take 1D6 necrotic damage, additionally at the end of each of the target's turns they must make a Willpower Endurance save or take 1D4 necrotic damage until the spell ends. While this spell is active on a creature, any creature that starts its turn or moves adjacent to a creature under the effect of blood corruption must make an endurance save or become infected with blood corruption, acting as if they have been targeted by the spell.

name: Disco Fever
description: Target a creature that you can see within range, they must succeed on a Willpower save or be forced to dance frantically in a style of your choosing for the duration of the spell. The target may use their action to repeat this save in an attempt to end the effect early on subsequent turns. While dancing in this manner a creature is limited in what they can do during their turn, if they wish to move then they may not take any actions of any kind as they dance around. If they wish to take any action or minor action then they may not move or take any other action of any kind that turn. While a creature is infected with disco fever any other creature that moves adjacent to or into the same hex must immediately make a Willpower save or become infected also.

name: Dead Man Walking
description: Target a creature you can see within range, the target must make a Willpower Strength save or take 2 necrotic damage for every hex they move in a turn for the duration of this spell. The target of this spell may repeat this save at the end of their turn in an attempt to end the spell early.

name: Hex of the Bound
description: Select a creature, of whom you have a physical part such as a tooth, fingernail or lock of hair. The target must make a Willpower save, on a failed save the caster and the target's life force are linked, any conditions affecting the caster will also affect the target of this spell and any damage or healing the caster receives will also be received by the target. In addition to the cost of this spell, the caster's maximum exertion is reduced by 2 for the duration of this spell.

name: Hex of the Craven
description: Select a creature, of whom you have a physical part such as a tooth, fingernail or lock of hair. The target must make a Willpower save, on a failed save the target is overcome by craven cowardice. Whenever a creature makes a melee attack against them they must make a Willpower save or become frightened of that creature for the duration of the spell. This save may be repeated at the end of each of the target's subsequent turns in order to end the frightened effect early. In addition to the cost of this spell, the caster's maximum exertion is reduced by 2 for the duration of this spell.

name: Hex of the Leper
description: Select a creature, of whom you have a physical part such as a tooth, fingernail or lock of hair. The target must make a Willpower save, on a failed save the target is inflicted with a hideous malady, they have -4 on all persuasion and performance checks and any creature within 2 metres of them must make a Strength Endurance save, on a failed save they are inflicted with poisoned (2) for an hour. Passing this save renders a creature immune to this effect. In addition to the cost of this spell, the caster's maximum exertion is reduced by 1 for the duration of this spell.

name: Mutilate
description:
Make a spell attack at a creature you can see within range, on a hit the target suffers 1D8 necrotic damage and 1D8 slashing damage. Additionally, the target must make a Willpower Endurance save, on a fail the caster must roll 1D6 causing the target of this spell to suffer the corresponding effect listed below:
1-3: The target's movement speed is reduced by 4 metres until they receive some form of healing, magical or otherwise
4-5: The target drops any items they are holding such as a weapon or shield and suffers a -1 to attack rolls until they receive some form of healing, magical or otherwise
6: The target is blinded until they receive some form of healing, magical or otherwise

name: Plague of Locusts
description: The caster sends out a swarm of biting insects to harass their foe. Make a spell attack at a creature you can see, on a hit the target takes 3D4 slashing damage.

name: Requiem
description: Target an enemy that you can see within range that is currently being affected by a spell you have cast, they immediately take 2D12 necrotic damage.

name: Rot
description: Make a melee spell attack at a creature you can see within range, on a hit the target suffers 2D8 necrotic damage. You may double the cost of this spell to deal 2D8+2 necrotic damage or triple it to deal 2D8+4 necrotic damage.

name: Rotting Pox
description: Target a creature you can see, that creature must make a Willpower Endurance save on a failed save the creature's flesh begins to rot and decay taking 1D8 necrotic damage at the start of each of their turns and gaining the poisoned (2) condition. The target may repeat the save at the start of each of their turns to end this spell's effects early.

name: Shatter Bones
description: Make a spell attack at a creature you can see within range, selecting a limb as if you have made an aimed shot. On a hit the target suffers 2D4 necrotic damage and must make a Willpower Endurance save or suffer the effects of an aimed shot for whatever limb was selected.

name: Soul Harvest
description: Target a creature you can see within range, you may remove any number of spells or spell effects that they have cast upon them. For each effect removed the target then takes 1D6 necrotic damage. Should this spell kill the target then you may select another creature within 20 metres of the target, they must make a Willpower Endurance save or gain all the negative spells that affected the target of this spell.

name: Soulbind
description: Target a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Willpower Endurance save or a great ethereal cage will spring from the ground around the hex they are currently occupying. This cage is immaterial and as such does not physically impact creatures. However, if the target creature leaves the caged hex or starts their turn out with it they will take 2D6 necrotic damage.

name: Well of Shadows
description: Target a hex within range, this hex becomes a well of shadows. Any creature that starts its turn in or adjacent to a well of shadows or moves adjacent to a well of shadows on their turn must make a Willpower Dexterity save or take 3D6 necrotic damage, taking half on a successful save.

name: Beacon of Hope
description: For the duration of this spell, all willing creatures of the caster's choosing within 10 metres of them gain +2 to all saves made against magic and may re-roll 1s.

name: Blessed Idol
description: Target a hex that you can see within range, in that hex appears a holy idol of your god. For the duration, any creatures of your choice within 10 metres of the idol that are in dying state do not have to roll their 1D6 every turn for being in dying state.

name: Cleanse of Body
description: Target a willing creature that you can see within range, they are immediately cured of the poisoned condition and any diseases that they are currently afflicted by.

name: Cosy Cubby
description: Target a room, cave, tent or other suitably enclosed stable structure no bigger than 10x10 metres. This space becomes magically imbued with comfortable warmth and a calming aura. While creatures stay in this space they will recover 2 exertions per 15 minutes rest rather than 1 and they will heal double from resting.

name: Divine Saviour
description: Target a willing creature that you can see within range, for the duration of this spell if the target would be reduced to 0 health or below they are instead reduced to 1 health and this spell immediately ends.

name: Favour of the Holy
description: Target a willing creature that you can see within range. For the duration of this spell whenever the target of this spell is healed, they are always considered to have rolled maximum on their healing dice. These dice should still be rolled however to determine if explosions happen or not.

name: Freed of Your Burdens
description: Target a willing creature within range, you may remove one condition of your choice that is afflicting them.

name: Light of Peace
description: Target up to three willing creatures that you can see within range, for the duration of this spell any creature that attempts to make an attack against this spell's target must make a Willpower Agility save or take 2D6 Holy Damage, taking half damage on a success.

name: Red Strings of Fate
description: The caster and the target are magically bound in such a way that each of their physical states mimics the other. For the duration of the spell, any damage that either the caster or the target takes is halved between the two with the initial receiver of the damage taking the majority. The halving of the damage is done after any resistances or armour. Additionally, any magical healing that either the caster or the target receives is afforded to both. The healing however is not halved, instead the full value is given to both.

name: Renew
description: Target a willing creature that you can see within range, they restore 2D4 health. You may double the cost of this spell to restore 3D4 health or triple it to restore 4D4 health. This spell can only be cast three times per day.

name: Restore
description: Touch a willing creature, they restore 3D8 health. This spell can only be cast three times per day.

name: Restore Clarity
description: Target a creature that you can see within range that is currently afflicted with the deaf or blind condition. The target has these conditions removed from them.

name: Restore Limb
description: Touch a creature that has lost a limb within the past week, the target regrows a single one of their lost limbs.

name: Selfless Sacrifice
description: Target a creature that you can see within range and take 1D8 holy damage that ignores all resistance, vulnerability, armour and armour-like effects. The target then has double the amount of damage you take +2 restored as health. This spell can only be cast three times per day.

name: Breath of Winter
description: Create a Spray with a width of 6 metres and a length of 8. All creatures in the target area must succeed on a Willpower Agility save or take 2D10 Cold damage, taking half damage on a successful save.

name: Brutal Bushes
description: Target up to 10 connected hexes that you can see within range, within these hexes grow dense tangled bushes of poison dripping brambles and vines. Moving through these hexes takes 4 metres of movement and whenever a creature starts their turn in one or moves into them they must succeed on a Willpower Endurance save or take 2D4 poison damage, taking half damage on a success.

name: Boar of the Boreal
description: Target a hex that you can see within range, in the target hex you summon a Boar of the Boreal. This boar rolls its own initiative and will follow the commands of the caster. The caster of this spell can give an order telepathically with no action required. However, they can never give more than one order in a round of combat. If the caster breaks concentration or the boar is killed it vanishes.

name: Boreal Blade
description: Target a weapon that you can see within range, you may change the target weapon's damage type to either cold or lightning. Additionally, the weapon deals an additional 1D4 damage for the duration of this spell.

name: Call of the Storm
description: Target up to 5 creatures you can see within range. These creatures must succeed on a Willpower Agility save or take 4D8 Lightning damage, taking half damage on a successful save.

name: Calm Beast
description: Target a beast you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Willpower save or be charmed by the caster for the duration of this spell.

name: Clap of Thunder
description: You create a spray with a width of 10 metres and a length of 8. Any creature in this area must make a Willpower Agility save or take 2D6 Force damage and 2D6 Lightning damage, taking half as much on a successful save.

name: Cloak of Thorns
description: Target a creature you can see within range. For the duration of this spell the target is adorned with a long flowing cloak of poison-tipped thorns. Whenever a creature adjacent to them hits them with a melee attack, they take 2D6 poison damage.

name: Constricting Vines
description: Target a creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Willpower Agility save or be constrained for the duration of this spell.

name: Cutting Winds
description: Target an area with a diameter of 10 metres that you can see within range. For the duration of the spell, any creature that enters the target area or starts their turn within it must succeed on a Willpower Endurance save or take 3D4 slashing damage, taking half damage on a successful save.

name: Gills
description: Target a creature that you can see within range. For the duration of this spell the target is able to breathe water as if it were air.

name: Ice Sheet
description: Target an area with a diameter of 10 metres. For the duration of this spell if a creature in the target area moves more than 2 metres at once they must make a Willpower Agility save or be knocked prone.

name: Invoke the Spirit of the Beast
description: Your body grows into a large hulking fur-covered version of itself, your size category increases by one, your Strength and Endurance attribute dice increase by one dice type to a maximum of 1D12 and any melee attacks you make deal +2 damage. This increase in attributes will increase your health but will not affect your exertion. Any health gained from this will be lost upon this spell ending. If one or both of your Strength or Endurance Attributes is already at 1D12 and thus cannot increase any further, you will instead gain +5 health for each attribute that cannot be increased.

name: Rainstorm
description: Target an area with a 24-metre diameter. The target area becomes engulfed in a heavy rain storm. Any creature in this area that takes either cold or lightning damage will take an additional 1D6 damage of this damage type.

name: Scorching Flame
description: Make a spell attack at a creature that you can see within range, on a hit the target takes 2D6 fire damage. Additionally, at the start of each of the target's turns they will take 1D6 fire damage for their next 3 turns or until the target takes an action to douse the flames.

name: Summer's Warmth
description: Soothing warmth emanates for 8 metres around the caster. Any creatures of your choice in this area have 2D4 Health restored. This spell can only be cast three times per day.

name: Swift as the Wind
description: Target up to 3 willing creatures within range. The targets gain 8 metres of additional movement speed for the duration of this spell.

name: Vine Whip
description: Target a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Willpower Agility save or take 2D8 slashing damage and be knocked prone, taking half damage and avoiding being knocked prone on a successful save.

name: Wrath of the River
description: Create a spray with a width of 2 metres and a length of 12 metres. Creatures in this area must make a Willpower Agility save or take 2D6 Cold damage and be knocked prone, taking half on a passed save and not being knocked prone.

name: Absorb Power
description: Target a summoned creature you control within range, that creature takes 2D4 force damage and either the caster or another creature within range is healed for the damage taken.

name: Acid Pool
description: You summon a pool of bubbling acid. Target a hex that you can see within range. The target hex is covered in burning acid for the duration of this spell. If a creature enters the affected hex or starts their turn in it, they must succeed a Willpower Agility save or immediately take 2D4 Acid damage.

name: Animate Shadow
description: You bring your Shadow to life and set it to a given task. Your shadow cannot physically interact with the world but can perceive its surroundings. You can telepathically communicate with your shadow and give it orders such as to monitor a given area or to follow a specific person. Your shadow will carry out its task to the best of its ability for the duration of this spell or until it is given another task. For the duration of this spell, the caster will not cast a shadow.

name: Beseech The Morrigan
description: You speak the ancient rhymes and make your sacrifice to call on the aid of a forgotten goddess of war. Target a hex that you can see within range and sacrifice a summoned creature within 6 metres of you, in the target hex you summon either an Aspect of The Morrigan. This Aspect rolls their own initiative and will follow the commands of the caster. All commands must be given verbally with no action required. However, they can never give more than one order in a round of combat. If the caster breaks concentration or the Aspect is killed, it is banished back to its home.

name: Black Tendrils
description: Target a hex within range. A dark portal opens in that area through which numerous black tentacles slither through. As a Minor action on each of your turns, you may cause the tendrils to attack any creature of your choice within 8 metres of the portal. This attack is made with your Occult skill and willpower and deals 2D8 Acid damage. Additionally, creatures attacked by the tendrils must make a Willpower Strength save or become pinned. A creature pinned in this manner may repeat the save at the end of each of its turns. If the caster has a summoned creature under their control within 6 metres, they may sacrifice it to halve this spell's exertion cost.

name: Call of The Wolf Divided
description: Target 4 connected hexes within range. A Wolf of Destruction appears in each hex under your control. The Wolves roll their own initiative and will follow the commands of the caster. All commands must be given verbally with no action required. If the caster breaks concentration or the wolves are killed, they are banished back to their home plane.

name: Curse
description: Select a creature, of whom you have a physical part such as a tooth, fingernail, or lock of hair. The target must succeed on a Willpower save or suffer one of the following effects of your choice for the duration of the spell: Lumbering (movement speed reduced by 4 metres), Dim (Mind attribute dice reduced by 1 dice type), Fearful (target is frightened of you), Foul Appearance (-2 to persuasion and performance skill checks), Restless Nights (target needs to rest 12 hours to be considered fully rested). Once the spell has been cast, the piece of the target used in the casting of the spell is turned to ash. At the end of the duration, the target must repeat their Willpower save or the curse will continue for another day. If the save fails for a third time, the curse becomes permanent. You may sacrifice a summoned creature within 6 metres to place up to 3 curse effects on a creature.

name: Crown of The Flowermaker
description: An ethereal crown of flowers appears on your head as you summon the wit and charm of The Flowermaker to bolster your allies. Any friendly creatures within 6 metres of the caster gain a +2 bonus to spell saves.

name: Eldritch Consumption
description: You summon esoteric energies from realms beyond realms to consume the bodies of your enemies. Target a creature you can see within range, that creature must succeed on a willpower agility save or take 2D6 Force damage. Taking half damage on a successful save. You may double the cost of this spell to deal 2D6+2 force damage or triple it to deal 2D6+4 force damage. Additionally, you may sacrifice a summoned creature within 6 metres of you to cause this spell to deal 2D10 Force damage instead of 2D6.

name: Forge Pact
description: Target a Fey, Demon, Celestial or Elemental that you have summoned within range. If the target is willing a pact is forged and they are bound to the caster (the obedience a summoned creature shows to its summoner is not enough on its own for the creature to be considered willing). The bound creature will no longer be banished to its home when the spell used to summon it ends and it will instead remain in the casters service for as long as the pact is maintained. While maintaining a pact the caster reduces their maximum exertion by 1. When the bound creature dies or the caster chooses to stop maintaining the pact the pact is broken and the bound creature is banished back to its home. Only one pact can be maintained at a time, if this spell is cast again to forge a new pact the previous pact is broken.

name: Glory of The Sun in Rags
description: You unleash the blinding glory of The Sun in Rags upon your foes. Target an area 10 metres in Diameter. Any creatures in that area must succeed on an agility willpower save or take 1D8 Holy damage and 1D8 Cold damage and will be Blinded until the end of their next turn. Taking half damage and not becoming blinded on a successful save. Additionally, you may sacrifice a summoned creature within 6 metres of you to cause this spell to deal 2D8 Holy damage and 2D8 Cold for the blindness to last 3 turns. Making a save at the end of each turn.

name: Grasp of The Starved
description: You open a portal through which gaunt and withered hands emerge, grasping your foe and draining them of life. Target a creature you can see within range. That creature must succeed on a Willpower Strength save or become constrained. Whilst a creature is constrained by this spell it takes 2D4 Necrotic damage at the start of each of its turns. A creature may repeat the save at the end of each of its turns. Additionally, you may sacrifice a summoned creature within 6 metres of you to cause this spell to deal 2D6 necrotic damage and 1 point of fatigue each turn.

name: Pentagram
description: You create a protective circle around yourself covering an area 6 metres in diameter. Any Fey, Demons, Celestials, Elementals or Undead attempting to cross this barrier must succeed on a Mind Willpower save or be prevented from crossing the barrier. You may sacrifice a summon creature when casting this spell to impose a -4 penalty to any of the specified creatures attempting to cross the barrier.

name: Summon Greater Fae
description: Target a hex that you can see within range, in the target hex you summon a Changeling. This creature rolls their own initiative and will follow the commands of the caster. All commands must be given verbally with no action required, However they can never give more than one order in a round of combat. If the caster breaks concentration or the creature is killed, it is banished back to its home. You may sacrifice a summoned creature within 6 metres of you to extend the duration of your summon to 8 hours.

name: Summon Crawling One
description: Target a hex that you can see within range, in the target hex you summon either a Crawling One. This creature rolls their own initiative and will follow the commands of the caster. All commands must be given verbally with no action required, However they can never give more than one order in a round of combat. If the caster breaks concentration or the Crawling One is killed it is banished back to its home.

name: Summon Imp
description: Target a hex that you can see within range, in the target hex you summon a small demonic being. This demon rolls their own initiative and will follow the commands of the caster. All commands must be given verbally with no action required, However they can never give more than one order in a round of combat. If the caster breaks concentration or the demon is killed it is banished back to its demonic home.

name: Summon Red Cap
description: Target a hex that you can see within range, in the target hex you summon a Red Cap. This creature rolls their own initiative and will follow the commands of the caster. All commands must be given verbally with no action required, However they can never give more than one order in a round of combat. If the caster breaks concentration or the creature is killed, it is banished back to its home. You may sacrifice a summoned creature within 6 metres of you to summon two creatures instead of one.

name: Summon Hound of Shadow
description: Target a hex that you can see within range, in the target hex you summon a Hound of shadow. This creature rolls their own initiative and will follow the commands of the caster. All commands must be given verbally with no action required, However they can never give more than one order in a round of combat. If the caster breaks concentration or the creature is killed, it is banished back to its demonic home.

name: The Lamenters Sorrow
description: Target up to 3 creatures you can see within range. They must succeed on a mind willpower save or be overcome with grief and sorrow, taking a -2 to attack rolls and skill checks as they lose the will to fight. An affected creature may repeat the save at the end of each of its turns. Additionally, you may sacrifice a summoned creature within 6 metres of you to cause this spell to pin affected creatures.

name: The Red Grail’s Feast
description: Your enemies are overcome with gluttonous urges they cannot control. Target a creature you can see within range, that creature must make a Willpower Mind save or suffer the following effects. An affected creature becomes Incapacitated until the end of its next turn as it spends the entirety of its next turn ravenously consuming any food it has access to or if it does not have any food, spends its turn trying to find some. In this state an affected creature will be unable to take combat actions or cast spells. Additionally, you may sacrifice a summoned creature within 6 metres of you to cause this spell to target up to 3 creatures.

name: The Watchman’s Lantern
description: You call upon The Watchman’s light, illuminating an area 10 metres around the caster. Additionally, any sources of magic such as enchanted items, ongoing spells or other magical phenomena become highlighted with a shimmering blue light.

name: Voices of the Past
description: The spell targets an area 26 metres in diameter, revealing important events that occurred in the past within the affected area. The spell is able to provide general information about actions or people but cannot provide specifics. For example if cast in the area of a murder the spell could reveal that the murder was committed by an Orc woman but would not reveal the tattoos she wore on her neck marking her out as a high ranking member of the Goknard clan.

name: Whispers of The Outsider
description: You fill a creature's mind with unnatural whispers, robbing them of their senses. Target a creature you can see within range, that creature must succeed on a mind willpower save or be subject to the following effects. An affected creature may only take either an action, minor action or reaction and has its movement speed reduced by half. A target may repeat the save at the end of each of its turns.

name: Banish
description: Target a creature that you can see within range. If the target creature is a summoned creature then the caster that summoned it must succeed on a Willpower Mind save or the summon is destroyed.

name: Blazing Light
description: Make a spell attack at a creature you can see within range, on a hit the target suffers 2D8 holy damage.
