You may double the cost of this spell to deal 2D8+2 holy damage or triple it to deal 2D8+4 holy damage. Additionally, if this spell targets an undead creature, it will deal an additional 1D4 damage.

name: Blessed Blade
description: Target a willing creature that you can see within range, the target deals Holy damage with their weapon and they deal additional 1D4 Holy damage for the duration of this spell. The additional damage is increased to 2D4 if the creature is an undead, demon or a fae.

name: Brand of the Sinner
description: Make a spell attack at a creature you can see within range, on a hit the target suffers 2D8 holy damage. Additionally if the target is an undead, demon or fae, they must succeed on a Willpower save or become frightened of you until the end of their next turn.

name: Divine Radiance
description: Target an object within range. For the duration of this spell the object emits light illuminating 10 metres around it and any enemy creature that ends their turn within 10 metres of it must succeed on a Willpower save or take 2D6 holy damage. If this save is passed then the target takes half damage.

name: Divine Shielding
description: Target a willing creature that you can see within range. The target has +2 to saves made against spells for the duration of this spell.

name: Ethereal Protector
description: Target a hex that you can see within range, in that hex a translucent figure appears to fight alongside you. This figure has a movement speed of 12m and moves on your turn. You may use your minor action to have them attack, using your Purity skill for their attack rolls and dealing 2D6 holy damage. This figure is not considered a creature and thus cannot be affected by conditions or effects that specify a creature.

name: Holy Ground
description: Target an area that you can see within range with a diameter of 10 metres. Any creatures of your choice are protected while in this area, gaining +4 to saves made against spells. Additionally, an undead will suffer 1D6 holy damage upon entering the target area or starting their turn in it.

name: Uno Reverso
description: Target a creature that you can see within range that is currently under the effects of a spell or other magical ability. The caster of the spell currently affecting the creature must make a Willpower save. If this save is failed then the spell effect is removed from the target. Additionally if the save was failed, you may select a creature within 10 metres of the target to move the spell effect onto. This new target is immediately targeted by the removed spell as if it were cast on them by the original caster. If the spell was concentration, then the caster of this spell is the caster concentrating on it.

name: Purge the Unclean
description: Target a willing creature that you can see within range, the target deals Holy damage with their weapon and they deal additional 1D6 Holy damage for the duration of this spell. This additional damage is increased to 2D6 if the creature is an undead, demon or a fae. Additionally, any hostile creature that comes within 6 metres of the target must make a Mind Willpower save or become frightened for the duration of this spell. A frightened creature may repeat this save at the end of each of its turns. Demons, undead and fae have a -2 to this save.

name: Purify
description: Target a hex within range, all food and drink within that hex is purified, rendering it clean of all poison and disease.

name: Revealing Light
description: The caster emits light illuminating 10 metres around them, any invisible creatures or objects are revealed while in this light. Additionally for the duration of this spell the caster may reroll 1s on perception skill checks to spot hidden objects or creatures.

name: Summon Celestial Guardian
description: Target a hex that you can see within range, in that hex a celestial figure appears to fight alongside you. This figure is a Celestial Guardian, they roll their own initiative and will follow the commands of the caster. All commands must be given verbally with no action required, However they can never give more than one order in a round of combat. If the caster breaks concentration or the Guardian is killed it is banished back to its home.

name: Summon Angel
description: Target a hex that you can see within range and sacrifice a summoned creature within 6 metres of you, in the target hex you summon a True Angel. This Angel rolls their own initiative and will follow the commands of the caster. All commands must be given verbally with no action required, However they can never give more than one order in a round of combat. If the caster breaks concentration or the Angel is killed it is banished back to its home.

name: Veil Sanctity
description: For the duration of this spell, all creatures of your choice receive +2 to saves made against spells and other magic effects. This bonus is increased to +4 if the save is made against an undead, demon or fae.

name: Wrath of the Divine
description: Target a hex that you can see within range. Any creatures occupying that hex or the ones adjacent to it must succeed on a Willpower Agility save or take 4D12 holy damage, taking half as much damage on a successful save.

name: Wrath of the Righteous
description: You create a spray with a width of 6 metres and a length of 10 metres. All creatures in the target area must make a Willpower Agility save or take 3D8 Holy damage, taking half as much on a successful save.

name: Armour Breaker
description: Target a weapon that you can see within range. For the duration of this spell, the target of this spell removes double the durability when it hits an armoured target.

name: Aspect of War
description: For the duration of this spell the caster may use their minor action to make attacks.

name: Bound Armament
description:
You touch a weapon as the target of this spell. The weapon that you cast this spell on becomes "bound" to you. While this weapon is bound to you, as an action you may teleport this bound weapon to your hand. Additionally, the weapon bound to you by this spell is not considered to occupy your hands for the purposes of casting.

You may only have a single weapon bound at any given time and you cannot cast this spell on any weapon that has this spell cast upon it already by another caster.

name: Bonk
description: When you hit a target with a melee weapon you may cast this spell. If you do so, the target takes an additional 1D8 Holy Damage or 2D8 if they are frightened.

name: Divine Guidance
description: Upon casting this spell, you and your allies receive +2 to your initiative scores on the next round of combat.

name: Entrapment
description: All creatures of the caster’s choosing within 10m of the caster must succeed on a Strength Willpower save or be pinned for 1 minute. The target may repeat their save at the end of each of their turns in an attempt to end the spell early.

name: Fortress of the Mind
description: For the duration of this spell all creatures of the caster’s choosing within 10m of the caster +2 to saves made against being charmed or frightened. Additionally, upon this spell being cast, all creatures of the caster’s choosing within 10m that are under the effects of the frightened or charmed condition may immediately make a save against the effect.

name: Holy Armour
description:
You create a gleaming set of armour hewn from light, with visuals of your own devising.
This armour is a set that can only be worn by the caster. It has a defence of 6 and durability of 20.
If this armour is in any way taken from the caster, it vanishes from existence with a flash. For the duration of this spell you may resummon this armour to your hands as an action.

name: Holy Weapon
description:
You create a melee weapon of burning holy light, with visuals of your own devising. You may opt for this weapon to be either two-handed or one-handed.
If you opt for it to be Two-Handed then it will deal 2D8+1 Holy Damage and be considered to have the two-handed keyword.
If you opt for it to be one handed then it will deal 2D6+1 holy damage.
If this weapon is in any way knocked from your grip or you simply put it down, it vanishes from existence with a flash. For the duration of this spell you may resummon this weapon to your hand as an action.
When making attacks with this weapon you will roll your War skill to hit rather than blunt or bladed. Additionally, the weapon summoned by this spell is not considered to occupy your hands for the purposes of casting.

name: Leaping Stomp
description: Target an unoccupied hex within range. Provided you have room to do so, you leap up into the air and crash down in the target hex facing in any direction you like. Any creatures adjacent to you when you land must succeed on a Willpower Agility save or take 2D6 bludgeoning damage, taking half damage on a successful save.

name: Quaking Stomp
description: You create spray with a width of 6 metres and a length of 8 metres. All creatures within the target area must succeed on a Willpower Dexterity save or be knocked prone.

name: Rapid Repair
description: Target a creature that you can see within range. If the target is wearing any armour, it immediately restores 5 durability.

name: Repelling Bonk
description:
When you hit a target with a melee weapon you may cast this spell. If you do so, the target must succeed on a Willpower Strength save or be knocked prone and flung backwards 8m.
If the target comes into contact with another creature or a solid object it will instead fall prone in that hex. In this case, for every hex that the target was unable to move they will take 1D4 bludgeoning damage.
If the target is stopped by another creature, that creature must succeed on a Strength Agility save or be knocked prone also. In this case, any bludgeoning damage taken is split between both creatures.

name: Spirit Ward
description: Target a willing creature that you can see within range. The creature’s health is increased by 10 for the duration of the spell or until this additional health has been removed via damage. This additional health may bring the target beyond their standard maximum health although they still may not be healed beyond their standard maximum health.

name: Tremour Stomp
description: All creatures within 6m must succeed on a Willpower Agility save or be knocked prone and take 2D10 fire damage. On a successful save the target is not knocked prone and takes half damage.

name: Warrior’s Guidance
description: Target a willing creature that you can see within range that is currently under the effect of the blind, deaf, charmed or frightened conditions. The target may immediately make a save against the effect if there is one to be made. If the save is successful the creature is cured of the condition for 1 minute.

name: War Cry
description: All creatures you designate within range that can see or hear you must succeed on a Willpower save or be frightened of you for the duration of the spell. At the end of each of their turns a creature affected by this spell may repeat the save in an attempt to end the spell early.
